title: Preoperative diagnosis and prediction of hepatocellular carcinoma: Radiomics analysis based on multi-modal ultrasound images
citation: Yao, Zhao & Dong, Daisy & Wu, Guoqing & Zhang, Qi & Yang, Daohui & Yu, Jin-Hua & Wang, Wen-Ping. (2018). Preoperative diagnosis and prediction of hepatocellular carcinoma: Radiomics analysis based on multi-modal ultrasound images. BMC Cancer. 18. 10.1186/s12885-018-5003-4.
